name: Sir Dice-A-Lot
description:
2 + 5 = 7?
6 + 3 = 4?

True OR False?

Be careful because a wrong answer will cost you a life, but hurry up before the time runs out.

Sir Dice-A-Lot is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
The theme was ROLL OF THE DICE.
This was my fourth game jam, and everything was created within 48 hours.
